item.title: Slayer on CheezScape Source
item.dc:creator: @Daedric Daedric
item.description:
@Daedric wrote:

Hi I’m sort of new here. I lurked alot and I decided to stop my tom foolery leeching and register, post, help, get help, etc. Anyways moving onto my question.

From all the sources I tried, only CheezScape has this: if(server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 2035) { if(playerLevel[18] >= 64){slayer = true;} else{slayer = false; sendMessage("You need a slayer level of 65 to slay Crypt Spyders.");} }

When using find, so far so good. The tutorial then tells you to add [code] if(slayermission == 1)
{
if(server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 1612)
{
if(playerEquipment[playerHat] != 4166)
{
NpcDrain(misc.random(18), 15, 247, 1612);
sendMessage(“This Banshee’s ganna pwn you!”);
sendMessage(“Go buy earmuffs - (ITEM ID - 4166)”);
}

                            if(playerLevel[18] >= 15){
           slayer = true;
        } else {
           slayer = false; 
           sendMessage("You need a slayer level of 15 fool...");
        }
                      }
  }
  if(slayermission == 2)
  {
                   if(server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 1648 || server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 1649 || server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 1650 || server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 1651 || server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 1652 || server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 1653 || server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 1654 || server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 1655 || server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 1656 || server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 1657)
                   {
                            if(playerLevel[18] >= 5){
           slayer = true;
        } else {
           slayer = false; 
           sendMessage("You need a slayer level of 5 fool...");
        }
                   }
  }
  if(slayermission == 3)
  {
                   if(server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 1600 || server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 1601 || server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 1602 || server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 1603)
                   {
                            if(playerLevel[18] >= 10){
           slayer = true;
        } else {
           slayer = false; 
           sendMessage("You need a slayer level of 10 fool...");
        }
                   }
  }[/code]

This is where I have the problem. I add that under the first code and I assume you have to add it under the last “}” in the first code. So I do, then the tutorial says “Declare” public int slayermission = 0; I have no idea what declare means and I assume when I didn’t add that and just saved and compiled from step 2 I get the four errors showing up in compile. Could someone explain declare and point out to me if I’m going about it the wrong way so far.

Thanks

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=248986.0
Link to the tutorial I’m following.

I also realise you get alot of threads with questions that can easily be found out by search and don’t give examples of where they’re going wrong, so I hope how I’ve layed this question out is suitable and won’t cause any disrespect towards me.

Read full topic
